plot: Everyone goes through the basic stages of life, the difference is how we choose to live the gaps in between. The question we continually ask ourselves, 'when will I start to live my life?' I guess its when you realize its that time of day.
title: Time of Day
plot_es: Everyone goes through the basic stages of life, the difference is how we choose to live the gaps in between. The question we continually ask ourselves, 'when will I start to live my life?' I guess its when you realize its that time of day.
plot_en: Everyone goes through the basic stages of life, the difference is how we choose to live the gaps in between. The question we continually ask ourselves, 'when will I start to live my life?' I guess its when you realize its that time of day.
